name: GALIXO
tag_list: tech, mobile, app, smartphone, tablet, web, internet, global, consulting, strategy, engineering, reengineering, business, marketing, experience, creativity, market, metrics, monetization, design, usability, business-model, branding, pr, media
overview:
Galixo designs business, marketing and technology strategies for business leaders and innovators around the globe involved in the mobile and technology sectors - internet, smartphones & tablets.

Content publishers and tech businesses today must engineer their business strategies in an increasingly globalized, crowded, and volatile market. Galixoâ€™s global strategic team partner with our clients to achieve critical mass, exponentially accelerating revenue and profitability. (Re)engineering also offers existing players an opportunity to (re)conquer both domestic and international markets with their mobile, web apps & internet platforms. Galixo designs powerful, innovative, even revolutionary strategies and methodologies. By connecting our clients with our global execution network, we offer rapid expansion and distribution to over 20 key markets across 5 continents.

In this time of increased globalisation and cultural melting pot, Galixo is proud to be a fluid and connected company reflecting our 21st century technological transformations and human interconnectedness.
